{{Quote|Jaime smashed the Riverlords at the Golden Tooth, and now lays siege to Riverrun.|Ser [[Kevan Lannister]]|The Pointy End}}
'''Golden Tooth''' is a stronghold in [[the Westerlands]]. It is the seat of [[House Lefford]], a noble house sworn to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. It is located near the [[River Road]], in the pass between two mountainous areas, northeast of Casterly Rock and southeast of [[Riverrun]], close to the borders between the [[Westerlands]] and the [[Riverlands]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Golden Tooth is the seat of House Lefford. It is a strong fortress and is well situated to guard the main pass through the mountains and the border with the Riverlands. Gold from the Golden Tooth is one of the major sources of House Lannister's massive wealth.
sections.History:
===[[Season 1]]===
It was the site of the first [[Battle of Golden Tooth|battle]] in the [[War of the Five Kings]], in which [[Jaime Lannister]] defeated the Riverlords.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/the-golden-tooth/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Golden Tooth entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/the-golden-tooth/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Golden Tooth entry]</ref>
